statements: SELECT * FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE sponsor_name = 'Acme Corp'
SELECT deal_id, sponsor_name, sponsor_amount FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE sponsor_amount > 10000
SELECT sponsor_name, start_date, end_date FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT sponsor_name, start_date, end_date FROM SponsorshipDeals ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT MAX(sponsor_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(sponsor_amount) AS min_amount FROM SponsorshipDeals
SELECT * FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE sponsor_amount > 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT deal_id, sponsor_name, sponsor_amount FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sponsor_amount DESC;
SELECT sponsor_name, start_date, end_date FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE sponsor_name LIKE 'A%' OR sponsor_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY sponsor_name ASC;
SELECT SUM(sponsor_amount) AS total_amount, AVG(sponsor_amount) AS avg_amount FROM SponsorshipDeals;
SELECT deal_id, start_date, end_date FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE sponsor_amount BETWEEN 3000 AND 7000 ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sponsorship;
SELECT organization_name, sponsor_name FROM Sponsorship WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sponsorship_id, organization_name, end_date FROM Sponsorship ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaign WHERE start_date <= '2022-12-31' AND end_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT organization_name, campaign_name, end_date FROM MarketingCampaign WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%summer%';
SELECT * FROM Sponsorship WHERE organization_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT sponsorship_id, sponsor_name FROM Sponsorship WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT organization_name, COUNT(*) as total_sponsorships FROM Sponsorship GROUP BY organization_name;
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaign WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, organization_name, campaign_name FROM MarketingCampaign WHERE organization_name LIKE '%Marketing%';
SELECT * FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE sponsorship_amount > 10000;
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsorship_amount FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Digital';
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsorship_amount, start_date, end_date FROM SponsorshipDeals ORDER BY sponsorship_amount DESC;
SELECT fan_name, engagement_level, engagement_date FROM FanEngagementData WHERE engagement_level = 'High' ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE sponsorship_amount > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT sponsor_name, COUNT(id) AS num_deals FROM SponsorshipDeals GROUP BY sponsor_name ORDER BY num_deals DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) AS campaign_duration FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Online' AND YEAR(start_date) = 2022;
SELECT fan_name, engagement_level, engagement_date FROM FanEngagementData WHERE engagement_level = 'High' ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT sponsor_name, SUM(sponsorship_amount) AS total_amount FROM SponsorshipDeals GROUP BY sponsor_name HAVING total_amount > 50000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT sponsor_name, amount FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE amount > 10000
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE budget >= 5000
SELECT org_name, location, establishment_date FROM BasketballOrganizations WHERE location = 'Los Angeles'
SELECT fan_name, engagement_type, interaction_count FROM FanEngagementData WHERE interaction_count BETWEEN 10 AND 20
SELECT deal_id, sponsor_name, start_date, end_date FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT deal_id, sponsor_name, amount FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE budget BETWEEN 50000 AND 100000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT fan_name, engagement_type, engagement_date FROM FanEngagementData WHERE engagement_type LIKE 'Social%' ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT org_name, location, establishment_date FROM BasketballOrganizations WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY org_name;
SELECT engagement_id, fan_name, engagement_type, interaction_count FROM FanEngagementData WHERE interaction_count > 50 ORDER BY fan_name, engagement_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM sponsorships;
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_type, sponsor_amount FROM sponsorships WHERE sponsor_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_end_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_city FROM teams WHERE team_city = 'New York';
SELECT game_date, game_location FROM games WHERE team1_id = 1 AND team2_id = 2 ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sponsorships WHERE sponsor_type = 'Gold';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT fan_name, fan_email, fan_birthday FROM fan_engagement ORDER BY fan_birthday DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT team_name, team_city, team_coach FROM teams WHERE team_city = 'New York' OR team_city = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_location, team1_id, team2_id FROM games WHERE game_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
